english.segment1: In the morning deep calls to deep. In the morning, you quietly speak. In the morning, you find those who seek, In the morning.
english.segment2: In the morning, I bring my request. In the morning, each care is confessed. In the morning, you quiet unrest. In the morning.
english.segment3: In the morning, I listen and wait. In the morning, faith anticipates. In the morning, you make my way straight, In the morning.
english.segment4: Hallelujah. Hallelujah. Hallelujah. Hallelujah. Hallelujah. In the morning, deep calls to deep. In the morning you quietly speak. In the morning you find those who seek, in the morning, in the morning.
